title: RBI penalises Axis Bank, HDFC Bank for deficiencies in regulatory compliance
description: The Reserve Bank of India has imposed penalties amounting to Rs 2.91 crore on Axis Bank and HDFC Bank for deficiencies in statutory and regulatory compliance. Axis Bank faces a penalty of Rs 1.91 crore, while HDFC Bank has been fined Rs 1 crore. The penalties address issues related to interest rates, KYC norms, and customer service.
